item.title: Python - REGEX
item.description: REGEX snake When being introduced to Python during the last unit this semester, I found the use of regular expressions, or REGEX for short, to be amazingly efficient in use of large sets of data. I definitely appreciated becoming proficient in R, but learning some Python basics seemed like a breath of fresh air. During the second homework assignment was when I was really tested with my REGEX skills in Python.
